page.description: returns true if word exists in string.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = word_exists(C string ,C word [,C delimiter ])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. (TRUE) if the Word is found in List.

argument.name: string
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of words or entries.

argument.name: word
argument.description: The word or entry to find in List.

page.discussion: The WORD_EXISTS() function determines whether a word exists in a list.
page.example: dim s as C s = <<%a% bird cow chicken goat %a% ? word_exists(s, "cow", crlf() ) = .T.
